metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37219 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise 1.10.1 Raft RPC layer allowsnon-server agents with a valid certificate signed by the same CA to accessserver-only functionality, enabling privilege escalation. Fixed in 1.8.15,1.9.9 and 1.10.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-37219` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

consul - 1.10.12+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: consul package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.12+dfsg1-1').
